name: Shoot n` Roll
description:
This game was made for the GMTK game jam 2022.

In Shoot  n` Roll you roll a dice to get ammunition and enemies , after you hop into battle with the enemies . Your goal is to defeat all the enemies without using  all your ammunition,  if you succeed you get money, with it you can buy weapons.

Thanks to Kirocaze for the awesome color palette . Check it out here: 

https://lospec.com/palette-list/kirokaze-gameboy

And also thanks to jsfxr for the awesome sound effects. It`s here:

 https://sfxr.me/
